tests.test_description: Running `apio build` should not return any error

steps_to_follow.step_description: Run the command `apio build` in the src folder of the project.

tests.expected_result: The code should compile without any errors.

tests.test_name: The game can be uploaded on the Go Board FPGA
tests.test_description: Running apio upload should complete without any errors.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Run the command `apio upload` in the src folder of the project.

tests.expected_result: No errors should occur, and the process should complete successfully.

tests.test_description: Pressing Switch 1 should move the frog one tile up.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Press the Switch 1 button.

tests.expected_result: The frog should move one tile up.

tests.test_description: Pressing Switch 4 should move the frog one tile down.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Press the Switch 4 button.

tests.expected_result: The frog should move one tile down.

tests.test_description: Pressing Switch 2 should move the frog one tile left.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Press the Switch 2 button.

tests.expected_result: The frog should move one tile left.

tests.test_description: Pressing Switch 3 should move the frog one tile up.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Press the Switch 3 button.

tests.expected_result: The frog should move one tile right.

tests.test_name: Single tile movement per button press
tests.test_description: When pressing a button, the frog should move only one tile in the corresponding direction. This behavior should occur even when the button is held down.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Press and hold the Switch 1 button.
Ensure that the frog moves only one tile up.
Press and hold the Switch 4 button.
Ensure that the frog moves only one tile down.
Press and hold the Switch 2 button.
Ensure that the frog moves only one tile left.
Press and hold the Switch 3 button.
Ensure that the frog moves only one tile right.

tests.expected_result: The frog should move exactly one tile in the pressed direction, even if the button is held down.

tests.test_name: Froggo loses a life when colliding with a car
tests.test_description: When the frog collides with a car, the frog should lose a life.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Move the frog on the first road lane.
Wait for a car to collide with the frog.

tests.expected_result: One fewer LED should be lit on the board.

tests.test_name: Froggo loses a life when entering the water
tests.test_description: When the frog enters the water, it should lose a life.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach the lower river bank after the road.
Ensure no log is coming on the first river lane and move up.

tests.expected_result: One fewer LED should be lit on the board.

tests.test_description: There should be 5 home bases displayed on the screen.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check the top of the screen.

tests.expected_result: There should be 5 home bases displayed on the top of the screen.

tests.test_name: Fluid movement of objects across the screen
tests.test_description: The movement of cars and logs should be fluid, without choppiness.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check the movement of the cars, logs and bonuses to ensure they move fluidly for 30 seconds.
Observe Froggo's movement to ensure it is fluid.
Check for any screen tearing or flickering.
Verify that the framerate remains stable.

tests.expected_result: All elements on the screen should move smoothly, with a stable framerate of at least 30fps.

tests.test_name: The textures of the elements are correct.
tests.test_description: Verify that the sprites of the cars, logs, frog, and bonuses match the expected designs.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Ensure Froggo's texture matches the expected sprite.
Ensure the cars' textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the logs' textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the bonuses' textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the home bases' textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the water's textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the road's textures match the expected sprites.
Ensure the safe zones' textures match the expected sprites.

tests.expected_result: The textures should match the expected ones.

tests.test_description: The lanes should contain various elements such as cars, logs, bonuses, etc.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Verify content of the lanes matches the elements indicated in the linked table.

tests.expected_result: Each lane should contain the elements indicated in the table.

tests.test_name: Froggo body display in home base during same level
tests.test_description: When the frog has reached a home base, its body should be displayed in the home base until the next level starts.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach a home base.
Verify the frog's body is displayed in the home base.
Repeat steps 1 and 2 for each home base.

tests.expected_result: The bodies of the frog should be displayed in the home bases until all the bases were reached and a new level starts.

tests.test_description: The snakes and otters should have moving animations.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Verify the snakes and otters have moving animations.

tests.expected_result: The snakes and otters should have moving animations with various textures.

tests.test_name: Objects are moving at the indicated speed
tests.test_description: Objects are moving at a pre-defined speed depening on the level and their lane.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Verify the speed of the cars, logs, bonuses, etc. matches the expected speed indicated in the linked table.

tests.expected_result: The objects should move at their expected speed.

tests.test_name: Limited time to cross the screen
tests.test_description: Froggo should have 30 seconds to reach the home base at the top of the screen.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait 30 seconds without moving the frog

tests.expected_result: One fewer LED should light up if time runs out.

tests.test_description: There should be a time indicator displayed on the screen.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check the presence of a time indicator on the screen like the one attached.

tests.expected_result: There should be a time indicator displayed on the screen.

tests.test_description: When 10 seconds remain, the time indicator should change its display.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check the presence of a time indicator on the screen like the one attached.
Wait until only 10 seconds remain, which should correspond to 1/3 of the time indicator.

tests.expected_result: The time indicator should change its display, switching to red when 10 seconds are left.

tests.test_description: When reaching an empty home base, the score should be incremented by 100 points.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach an empty home base.

tests.expected_result: The score should have been incremented by 100 points.

tests.test_description: When filling a home base, the frog should be warped to the bottom of the screen.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach an empty home base.

tests.expected_result: A sprite of the frog should be warped to the bottom of the screen.

tests.test_description: When all home bases are filled, the level should be incremented by 1.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Fill all the home bases.

tests.expected_result: The home bases should be emptied and the level should be incremented by 1 on the 7-segment display.

tests.test_name: Game resets after losing all lives
tests.test_description: When no more LEDs are litted, the game should reset to the first level with 3 lives.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Lose all lives.

tests.expected_result: The home bases should be emptied, the 7-segment display should show the number 1 and the 3 lives LEDs should be light

tests.test_description: The player should win the game upon beating the 8th level.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Beat the 8th level.

tests.expected_result: The gameâ€™s state machine should switch to the 'WIN' state.

tests.test_description: Upon winning the game, the game should reset to the first level with 3 lives.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Complete the 8th level.

tests.expected_result: The home bases should be cleared, the 7-segment display should show '1', and the 3 life LEDs should light up.

tests.test_description: If Froggo reaches a home base that is already occupied, the player should lose a life.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach and fill an empty home base.
Attempt to fill the same home base again.

tests.expected_result: The player should lose a life, and the home base should remain filled. Froggo should warp to the bottom of the screen.

tests.test_description: Otters should start appearing on the screen beginning from level 3.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Progress to level 3.

tests.expected_result: Otters should appear on screen during level 3.

tests.test_description: Otters should move 10% faster than other objects in their lane.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach the 3rd level.
Wait for the otters to appear.

tests.expected_result: The gap between otters and the logs ahead in the same lane should decrease.

tests.test_description: Snakes should appear on the screen beginning from level 3.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Progress to level 3.

tests.expected_result: Snakes should appear on the screen during level 3.

tests.test_description: In level 1, Froggo may float off-screen for one frame.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Start level 1.
Jump onto a log.
Wait for the log to move off-screen while Froggo is still on it.
Verify Froggo behaviour.

tests.expected_result: Froggo should float off-screen for one frame and then reappear without losing a life.

tests.test_description: The scoring system should match the predefined values.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check the scoring system matches the predefined values.

tests.expected_result: The score should increment as defined in the game's scoring system.

tests.test_description: If the player reaches 20,000 points, an extra life should be granted if the player has fewer than 4 lives.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Lose a life to reduce the number of lives to fewer than 4.
Reach a score of 20000 points.
Verify that you have 4 lives.

tests.expected_result: The player should gain an extra life upon reaching 20,000 points, provided fewer than 4 lives remain.

tests.test_description: Froggo lives when on a log, jumping on a log should not make Froggo lose a life.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for logs to appear
Jump onto a log
Verify if Froggo loses a life

tests.expected_result: Froggo should not lose a life when he jumps on a log.

tests.test_description: Froggo should move with the logs.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for logs to appear
Jump on the logs
Ensure that Froggo moves along with the logs.

tests.expected_result: Froggo should be transported along with the logs.

tests.test_name: Turtle - Can Be On Turtles' Back
tests.test_description: Froggo should be able to be on a turtle's back and move with it.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for turtles to appear
Jump on the turtles back
Verify the behavior of Froggo
Verify Froggo moves with the turtle

tests.expected_result: Froggo should be able to jump on the turtles back and move with it. Without losing a life

tests.test_description: Cars should move in different directions across the lanes.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Cars in Lane 1 should move from left to right.
Cars in Lane 2 should move from right to left.
Cars in Lane 3 should move from left to right.
Cars in Lane 4 should move from right to left.
Cars in Lane 5 should move from left to right.

tests.test_description: Froggo can move when on turtles

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for turtles to appear
Hop on the turtles back
Try to move Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo should be able to move when on the turtles back. From left to right and right to left.

tests.test_description: Turtles should dive at regular intervals.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for the diving turtles to appear.
Verify the turtles dive periodically

tests.expected_result: The turtles should dive approximately every 2 seconds.

tests.test_description: Froggo should lose a life when the turtles dive.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for diving turtles to appear
Jump onto the turtles' back.
Wait for the turtles to dive
Verify the behavior of Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo should lose a life if he remains on the turtles' back when they dive.

tests.test_description: Logs should have varying lengths.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for logs to appear.
Compare the lengths of the logs.
Compare the small logs to medium logs.
Compare the small logs to long logs.
Compare the medium logs to long logs.

tests.expected_result: Logs should appear in different lengths as expected.

tests.test_description: Froggo should be able to walk on the backs of alligators.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator to appear in the water.
Jump onto the alligator's back.
Verify the behavior of Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo should be able to jump onto the alligator's back, regardless of its state.

tests.test_description: Froggo should be able to walk safely on an alligator's closed jaws.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator to appear in the water
Wait for the alligator to close its jaws.
Jump onto the alligator while its jaws are closed.
Verify the behavior of Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo should not lose a life when walking on the alligator's closed jaws.

tests.test_description: Froggo should lose a life when walking on an alligator's open jaw.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator to appear in the water
Wait for the alligator to open its jaws.
Move Froggo onto the alligator's open jaw.
Check the behavior of Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo should lose a life when walking onto the alligator's open jaws.

tests.test_description: If an alligator's head remains visible in a home bay for more than two seconds, Froggo should lose a life upon entering the bay.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator head to appear in one of the home bases.
Enter the home bay after two seconds have passed.
Check the behavior of Froggo.

tests.expected_result: Froggo should lose a life when entering the home bay after the alligator's head has been visible for more than two seconds.

tests.test_description: Otters should attempt to push Froggo off floating objects.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach level 3
Place Froggo at the edge of a log.
Wait for an otter to appear
Verify the behavior of the otter

tests.expected_result: Otters should try to push Froggo off the logs.

tests.test_description: Snakes should move from left to right across the screen.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Reach level 3
Wait for a snake to appear on the screen.
Verify the direction of the snake.

tests.expected_result: The snake should move from the left to the right of the screen.

tests.test_description: If an alligator's head has been visible in a home bay for less than two seconds, Froggo should be immune upon entering that bay.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator head to appear in one of the home bases.
Enter the home bay before two seconds have passed.
Check the behavior of Froggo.

tests.expected_result: Froggo should not lose a life when entering a home bay within two seconds of the alligator's head appearing.

tests.test_description: Alligators should move at the same speed as other objects in their lane.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for an alligator to appear
Check the speed of the alligator.
Compare the alligator's speed with other objects in its lane.

tests.expected_result: Alligators should move at the same speed as logs.

tests.test_description: The pink lady frog should appear randomly on the logs.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for pink lady to appear
Check if the pink lady appears at random intervals.

tests.expected_result: The pink lady should appear at random intervals.

tests.test_name: Pink Lady Bonus - Spawning on a single log
tests.test_description: The Pink Lady frog should remain on a single log.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for ping lady to appear
Verify that she appears on a single log.

tests.expected_result: The Pink Lady should remain on a single log and not move.

tests.test_description: The Pink Lady frog should move only horizontally.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for the Pink Lady to appear on the screen.
Check the horizontal movement of the Pink Lady.

tests.expected_result: The Pink Lady should move horizontally, from left to right and right to left.

tests.test_name: Pink Lady Bonus - Froggo sprite change
tests.test_description: When Froggo reaches the same position as the Pink Lady, Froggo's sprite should change to a different color.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for the Pink Lady to appear on the screen.
Move Froggo to the Pink Lady's position.
Verify the sprite of Froggo

tests.expected_result: Froggo's sprite should change to a different color and a glowing effect upon contact.

tests.test_name: Pink Lady Bonus - Bonus Points Addition
tests.test_description: If Froggo escorts the Pink Lady to a home bay, the score should increase by 200 points.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for pink lady to appear.
Escort the Pink Lady to a home bay.
Verify the score has been incremented.

tests.expected_result: The score should increase by 200 points.

tests.test_name: Random Appearance - Fly in home base
tests.test_description: A fly should randomly appear in one of the empty home bays.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for a fly to appear at random intervals.
Verify if the fly appears in an empty home bay.

tests.expected_result: A fly should appear in one of the empty home bays at random intervals.

tests.test_name: Bonus Points - Frog in home base
tests.test_description: If a fly is present in one of the home bays, Froggo should earn 200 points upon entering.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Wait for a fly to appear.
Move Froggo into the home bay with the fly.
Verify the score gets updated by 200 points.

tests.expected_result: The score should increase by 200 points when Froggo enters the home bay with a fly.
